mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travel ( title, start_date, end_date, created_by, created_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{createdBy}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS travelId, t.title AS title, t.start_date AS startDate, t.end_date AS endDate, t.created_at AS createdAt FROM travel t JOIN user_travel ut ON t.id = ut.travel_id WHERE ut.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t.created_at DESC
